sentences.en: A complete quiz and midterm exam are also available, with solutions.
sentences.cn: 我们提供整套以往用作随堂考和期中考的试题作参考之用, 兼附解答参考.

sentences.en: Dad volunteered to coach me in English before my English midterm.
sentences.cn: 爸爸自愿的在我英语期中考前辅导我英文.

sentences.en: Do at least one explication by midterm, another before Lecture 24.
sentences.cn: 在期中之前至少交一篇说明,在第24课前交另一篇.

sentences.en: Enclosed is the format guideline of midterm report for your reference.
sentences.cn: 附档是关于期中分组报告的格式,供各位参考.

sentences.en: I stayed up the all night absorbinging for my midterm math exam.
sentences.cn: 我为了我的期中数学做卷子题目测考题卷熬了一整夜.

sentences.en: I think you need to take another look at my midterm.
sentences.cn: 我想您该再看一次我的期中考卷.

sentences.en: I'm finally through with all my midterm exams.
sentences.cn: 我终于很顺利的通过了期中考.

sentences.en: I've get to go over my notes to tomorrow's midterm.
sentences.cn: 我不可不为明天的期中做卷子回温记事本.

sentences.en: Listed below are the Midterm exam and two quizzes from this semester.
sentences.cn: 下列连结为本学期之期中考与两次随堂考的考题.

sentences.en: Midterm cancellation will result in immediate withdrawal of cover and no further risk retention by us.
sentences.cn: 中期取消将导致立即撤出支付,不得再保留我们的风险.

sentences.en: Midterm examination and solutions has been released. Download HERE.
The subject will have one midterm and a final exam.
sentences.cn: 学科将有一次期中考和一次期末考.

sentences.en: The war in Iraq was [ a ] key issure in the midterm elections.
sentences.cn: 伊拉克战争是中期选举中的关键因素.

sentences.en: These are called midterm elections because they come halfway through the president term.
sentences.cn: 这个被称为竞选中期,因为他们在总统的任期中间举行的.

sentences.en: This section contains the midterm exam and solutions for the course.
sentences.cn: 这部份里包括这门课的期中考和解答.

trans.tran_en: in the middle of an elected government’s time in power

trans.tran_cn: 期中考试； 中期； 期中
trans.tran_en: the middle period of an elected government’s time in power
